item.title: Show HN：我正在销售ShotCut.in - 一个带有400K+点击的链接缩短器，等等
item.description:
嗨，我想出售我的链接缩短平台shotcut.in。 It's been live for over a year and has:400k+ total link clicks3k+ links shortenedFeatures: link shortening, analytics, QR codes, bio pages, and link managementChrome extension, Telegram bot, and a Python package includedGoogle Ads approvedUsed by a California city governmentEverything is up and running.如果您有兴趣或有疑问，请随时接触。 邮件：-tanish@shotcut.in 谢谢！
注释url： https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id=43943543 点：1 ＃评论：0
